sources.name: ADLdataset01
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  ADLdataset01

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared ADLdataset01 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://adltest08.dfs.core.windows.net/test01/sales.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared DataSource = let
  Source = ADLdataset01
in
  Source;
shared FactSales = let
  Source = DataSource,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"SalesTerritoryKey", "GeographyKey", "CustomerKey", "ProductKey", "CurrencyKey", "OrderDateKey", "DueDateKey", "ShipDateKey", "PromotionKey", "SalesOrderNumber", "SalesOrderLineNumber", "RevisionNumber", "OrderQuantity", "UnitPrice", "ExtendedAmount", "UnitPriceDiscountPct", "DiscountAmount", "ProductStandardCost", "TotalProductCost", "SalesAmount", "TaxAmt", "Freight"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Choose columns", {{"SalesTerritoryKey", Int64.Type}, {"GeographyKey", Int64.Type}, {"CustomerKey", Int64.Type}, {"ProductKey", Int64.Type}, {"CurrencyKey", Int64.Type}, {"OrderDateKey", Int64.Type}, {"DueDateKey", Int64.Type}, {"ShipDateKey", Int64.Type}, {"PromotionKey", Int64.Type}, {"UnitPrice", Currency.Type}, {"OrderQuantity", Int64.Type}, {"ExtendedAmount", Currency.Type}, {"UnitPriceDiscountPct", type number}, {"DiscountAmount", Currency.Type}, {"ProductStandardCost", Currency.Type}, {"TotalProductCost", Currency.Type}, {"SalesAmount", Currency.Type}, {"TaxAmt", Currency.Type}, {"Freight", Currency.Type}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
